Shorthills AI

31,610 followers

1h

Technology has value when it serves a larger purpose.
This year, our CSR efforts focused on supporting communities, education, sustainability, and access to the right information—from sponsoring MRIDA’s football team uniforms and a lactation room at IIT Delhi, to building solutions for forest management and creating research-backed guides for patients and families affected by rare genetic conditions.

As part of Shorthills Recap 2025, Day 6 reflects our commitment to using technology responsibly and creating impact beyond business.

#shorthillsai #yearinreview #shorthillsrecap2025 #CSR

2d

Stories travel further when the work connects.
This year, Shorthills AI was featured online, in print, and on TV—reflecting the impact of our work.

As part of Shorthills Recap 2025, Day 5 highlights the moments when our journey, ideas, and solutions found a wider voice through media conversations.

#shorthillsai #yearinreview #shorthillsrecap2025 #mediafeatures

3d

Behind every outcome is a team that makes it happen.
From everyday moments to shared celebrations, life at Shorthills AI is shaped by the people who bring curiosity, collaboration, and energy to everything they do.
 
As part of Shorthills Recap 2025, Day 4 offers a glimpse into the culture, celebrations, and people that make Shorthills more than just a workplace.
